# WXX [Week Title]

> **Template Type:** Weekly lesson (deep instructional format)  
> **Audience:** Self-directed learner building job-ready SMB AI tools  
> **Default stance:** Vertical-agnostic unless explicitly stated

[1–2 sentence module framing. State what this week teaches and why it matters in the overall program sequence.]

---

## Week Outcome (Measurable Objective)

By the end of this week, you will produce:

- [Specific artifact/output #1]
- [Specific artifact/output #2]
- [Specific artifact/output #3]

### Success condition (measurable)
[Define exact measurable condition. Examples: “working API endpoint with 3 tested routes,” “ranked opportunity brief with 20 pain statements,” “deployed app URL + demo video + checklist.”]

---

## Competency Gate

**You can [capability statement in plain language].**

### Gate evidence required
To pass this week, you must demonstrate:

- [Evidence item #1]
- [Evidence item #2]
- [Evidence item #3]

QA Checklist (Self-Review)
Content quality

 Deliverables match the stated objective

 All required sections are complete

 Examples are labeled SIMULATED if not real

 Reasoning/assumptions are visible (not hidden)

Technical quality (if applicable)

 Commands run successfully

 Outputs match expected format

 No missing files / broken references

Documentation quality

 File names are correct

 Steps are explicit and reproducible

 Another person could follow without guessing

Submission Checklist

 All required artifacts created

 Artifacts use required schema/format

 QA checklist completed

 Self-scored with appropriate rubric

 Final package is reviewable

Rubric Summary

[Criterion 2]	[XX]%
[Criterion 3]	[XX]%
[Criterion 4]	[XX]%
